attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I live in Doncaster and work in Wakefield.
It takes a bus 2-3 hrs(none at time i leave)and there messy.
Train costs £11.00 a day return.(not always one availible) 
I work for IT company Fujitsu.
08.00am till 18.00 hrs.
I park on side road to avoid parking costs.
I make an effect to go to work and pay my way (and keep getting penalised for it).
NO TO MORE TAX ON CARS

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call to action, not your name. Also there are several similar petitions, you may wish to consider signing one of those.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
